title: Understanding Changes in Higher Education Learning Systems: Reflective Critical Practice Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational higher education system comprehension and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: System change competency enhancement for graduate school language education instructors through real-world case studies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain major trends in changes to higher education learning systems.
Learners can evaluate educational design cases by applying a reflective critical practice framework.
Learners can propose practical strategies for building collaborative relationships between instructors and designers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
